title: Principal Solutions Consultant - Application Security
description:
OPENTEXT - THE INFORMATION COMPANY
  
OpenText is a global leader in information management, where innovation, creativity, and collaboration are the key components of our corporate culture. As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to partner with the most highly regarded companies in the world, tackle complex issues, and contribute to projects that shape the future of digital transformation.
  
  

AI-First. Future-Driven. Human-Centered.
  
At OpenText, AI is at the heart of everything we do—powering innovation, transforming work, and empowering digital knowledge workers. We're hiring talent that AI can't replace to help us shape the future of information management. Join us.
  
  

Role Overview
  
  

OpenText is seeking a highly skilled and motivated Application Security Principal Solutions Consultant to join our Application Security Solutions Consulting team in Europe. This role is pivotal in driving strategic customer sales engagements, leading technical solutioning efforts including demonstrations and presentations of the solutions, proof-of-concepts and similar pre-sale activities. You will work closely with Account Executives, Product Management, Partner Account Managers, Professional Services and Engineering to deliver compelling customer-tailored solutions and ensure successful adoption of our Application Security platform.
  
  

Key Responsibilities
  
  

* Lead technical discovery sessions with prospects and customers to understand their security challenges and requirements.
* Design and present tailored Application Security solutions that align with customer needs and objectives.
* Deliver compelling product demonstrations, proof-of-concepts (PoCs) and technical workshops.
* Identify the growth path and scalability options of a solution and participate in the architectural design.
* Advance opportunities using effective consultative selling techniques
* Actively identifies opportunities to assist peers globally in area of expertise (e.g., writing white-papers).
* Mentor and coach junior Solutions Consultants, fostering a culture of excellence and continuous learning.
* Collaborate with the Senior Manager to define team strategy, goals, and development plans.
* Act as a technical escalation point for complex customer scenarios.
* Partner with Sales and Partner Account Managers to drive pipeline growth and conversion through strategic technical support.
* Work with Product Management to provide feedback and influence roadmap based on customer insights.
* Support Marketing with thought leadership, webinars and event participation.
* Stay current with industry trends, competitive landscape and emerging technologies in Application Security.
* Represent OpenText at industry events, conferences and customer forums.


Qualifications
  
  

* Proven experience (8+ years) in Solutions Consulting, Sales Engineering or Pre-Sales in the Application Security domain.
* Deep understanding of Application Security Testing concepts including SAST, DAST, SCA, API Security and DevSecOps practices.
* Deep understanding and ability to explain the nature of key application security attacks flow and vulnerabilities for Web Applications and APIs.
* Demonstrated ability to work as the lead for large complex projects at a regional level
* Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to engage both technical and business stakeholders.
* Experience leading technical teams and mentoring peers.
* Fluent in English; Swedish, Danish and Finnish language skills are an important advantage.
* Willingness to travel within the Nordics and across Europe, and occasionally to North America.


Preferred Skills
  
  

* Hands-on experience with modern CI/CD pipelines and cloud-native environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Familiarity with security standards and frameworks (OWASP, NIST, DORA).
* Software Development experience and good familiarity with the main modern programming languages, software development concepts and frameworks.
* Experience with enterprise software sales cycles and customer success strategies.


What We Offer
  
  

* Competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Opportunities for career growth and leadership development.
* A collaborative and inclusive team culture.
* Access to cutting-edge technologies and training.


OpenText's efforts to build an inclusive work environment go beyond simply complying with applicable laws. Our Employment Equity and Diversity Policy provides direction on maintaining a working environment that is inclusive of everyone, regardless of culture, national origin, race, color, gender, gender identification, sexual orientation, family status, age, veteran status, disability, religion, or other basis protected by applicable laws.
  
If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or recruiting process, please contact us athr@opentext.com. Our proactive approach fosters collaboration, innovation, and personal growth, enriching OpenText's vibrant workplace.

title: IFS Affärskonsult - Vivicta
description:
As of 2 September 2025, Tietoevry Tech Services, earlier part of Tietoevry Group, will operate as a standalone company. We'll soon be operating under a new name: Vivicta. You will discover more about our new brand by the end of the year. Read more.
You may apply by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens affärslösningar?
Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av IFS och vill ta nästa steg i din karriär i ett team där kompetens, samarbete och utveckling står i centrum. Hos oss får du arbeta fokuserat med IFS i ett dedikerat team samtidigt som du blir en del av ett större sammanhang både med IFS som partner men även internt på Vivicta.
Vivicta är en ledande systemintegratör med över 1100 ERP-konsulter som lär av varandra och delar erfarenheter. Det betyder att du får tillgång till ett brett nätverk av kompetens som hjälper dig att utvecklas framåt. Hos oss finns även expertis inom AI, infrastruktur, testledning, integration och automation, vilket ger dig möjlighet att bredda din kunskap och växa inom flera områden.
Vi erbjuder en rad förmåner och en kultur som präglas av samarbete, kompetensutveckling och prestigelöshet.
När du börjar hos Vivicta som IFS affärskonsult:
Kommer du få en nyckelroll i att hjälpa våra kunder att utveckla och optimera sina affärsprocesser med hjälp av IFS Cloud. Du arbetar nära kunden i både projekt och förvaltning, och bidrar med rådgivning, konfiguration, förbättringsförslag och lösningsdesign, detta alltid med affärsnytta i fokus. Du sätter dig in i deras behov, utmanar och stöttar med lösningar som gör skillnad.
Du blir en del av ett engagerat och kunnigt team som arbetar med hela livscykeln för IFS-lösningar: från projekt till support och förvaltning till proaktiv utveckling och strategisk rådgivning.  

Vi söker dig som:* Har erfarenhet av affärssystem, gärna IFS (Cloud eller tidigare versioner), och vill utvecklas i en konsultroll.
* Har arbetat som superuser, systemägare, processägare eller i en roll med djup systemvana (t.ex. ekonomi, inköp, logistik, produktion, HR eller underhåll).
* Har god förståelse för affärsprocesser och systemstöd. Erfarenhet av ERP-implementering, förändringsledning eller systemförvaltning är meriterande.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska och är baserad i Sverige.

  

Som person är du:* Rådgivande, proaktiv och lösningsorienterad.
* Trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Affärsmässigt driven och vill skapa verkligt kundvärde.

  

Vi erbjuder dig:
Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Du erbjuds också:* Spännande uppdrag hos både stora och medelstora kunder inom olika branscher
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och möjlighet att växa i din roll
* Ett prestigelöst team där vi lär av varandra och har roligt tillsammans
* Unika fördelar som konsult att ta del av alla dem möjligheter som vårt partnerskap med IFS erbjuder


Blev du inspirerad?
Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta anställande chef, Adam Taurell, adam.taurell@vivicta.com.  

Hoppas vi hörs snart!
Plats: Sverige *Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*  

*Vivicta tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*

title: Presales Solution Consultant, CPQ
description:
**Company Description**  

It all started in sunny San Diego, California in 2004 when a visionary engineer, Fred Luddy, saw the potential to transform how we work. Fast forward to today — ServiceNow stands as a global market leader, bringing innovative AI-enhanced technology to over 8,100 customers, including 85% of the Fortune 500®. Our intelligent cloud-based platform seamlessly connects people, systems, and processes to empower organizations to find smarter, faster, and better ways to work. But this is just the beginning of our journey. Join us as we pursue our purpose to make the world work better for everyone.

 **Job Description**  

As a member of our Solution Consulting team, you will play a pivotal role in accelerating our EMEA revenue growth by supporting CRM, CPQ, and digital commerce solution sales across a range of industries. You will act as a hands-on technical consultant and strategic advisor, collaborating closely with Sales, Product Management, and cross-functional stakeholders to craft customer-centric solutions. This role combines deep technical acumen with strong business insight to drive high-impact engagements throughout the pre-sales cycle.  

  

**What you get to do in this role:**  

The Advisory Solution Consultant is a senior-level technical expert responsible for developing and positioning tailored solutions during the sales process. You’ll guide customers through discovery, design, and demonstration, aligning solutions with their business objectives while helping drive sales performance.  

* Support sales efforts as a technical and domain expert across CRM, CPQ, and automation platforms
* Lead engaging technical discovery sessions and workshops to uncover customer challenges and use cases
* Design and deliver tailored product demonstrations that effectively highlight business value
* Build trusted relationships with both technical and executive stakeholders, including C-level decision-makers
* Provide actionable insights and feedback to Product and Engineering teams to improve offerings
* Share best practices, reusable assets, and industry knowledge with the broader Solution Consulting team
* Stay up to date on market trends, competitors, and emerging technologies
* Represent the company at key marketing and customer events, including workshops, briefings, and conferences
 **Qualifications**  

To be successful in this role, you have:

* 7+ years of experience in pre-sales solution consulting, sales engineering, or a similar role
* Deep expertise in CRM and CPQ technologies, ideally across platforms like Salesforce, ServiceNow, SAP, Oracle, Adobe, or Shopify
* Strong technical understanding of APIs, middleware, cloud-native architecture, and web technologies (JavaScript, JSON)
* Proven experience conducting technical discovery sessions and designing customer-focused solutions
* Excellent communication and presentation skills across technical and business audiences
* Strong collaboration skills, with experience working cross-functionally with Sales, Product, Engineering, and Marketing teams
* Ability to think strategically and operate independently in a fast-paced, remote-first environment
* Confidence and experience in engaging executive-level stakeholders and influencing strategic decisions
* ServiceNow or other relevant cloud platform certifications are a plus
* Experience within industry verticals such as manufacturing, telecommunications, or technology
* **Travel Requirements:** Up to 25% travel for client meetings, workshops, and events
* **Language Requirements:** English ans Swedish fluency required

 **Additional Information** **Work Personas**


We approach our distributed world of work with flexibility and trust. Work personas (flexible, remote, or required in office) are categories that are assigned to ServiceNow employees depending on the nature of their work and their assigned work location. Learn more here. To determine eligibility for a work persona, ServiceNow may confirm the distance between your primary residence and the closest ServiceNow office using a third-party service.

**Equal Opportunity Employer**


ServiceNow is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status, or any other category protected by law. In addition, all qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with legal requirements.

**Accommodations**


We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates. If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are unable to use this online application and need an alternative method to apply, please contact globaltalentss@servicenow.com for assistance.

**Export Control Regulations**


For positions requiring access to controlled technology subject to export control regulations, including the U.S. Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may be required to obtain export control approval from government authorities for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by relevant export control authorities.

title: Legal Counsel
description:
Vill du vara med och utmana den svenska telekommarknaden i ett bolag som drivs av utmanartänk, entreprenörsanda och gemensamt arbete i ett härligt gäng? Härligt – då är du den jurist vi letar efter!
  
  

Din nya roll
  
  

Som Legal Counsel på Tre kommer du att arbeta nära den operativa verksamheten. Du kommer att ha en bred roll där du förväntas arbeta med allehanda juridisk rådgivning, framför allt kommersiell avtalsrätt men i denna roll även tvister och löpande rådgivning inom rättsområden såsom t ex. marknadsrätt, immaterialrätt, konsumenträtt, IT-rätt och GDPR.
  
  

Rollen rapporterar till Head of Legal. Teamet består i dagsläget av nio jurister och två paralegals. Du kommer också att arbeta nära bolagets övriga jurister inom Regulatory & Privacy och Compliance.
  
  

**Du kan se fram emot att:**  

* Jobba brett men ändå fokuserat med den affärsjuridik som intresserar dig.
* Vara en del av en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser (Great Place to Work 2025)
* Jobba på kontoret i 3Huset, byggt för oss Treor. Men vi har också utrymme för flexibilitet och möjlighet att jobba hemifrån någon dag i veckan.
* Fortsätta bygga din karriär och utvecklas i ett mycket kompetent, drivet och mycket trevligt och glatt team!


Som en del av Tre har du även tillgång till vårt fräscha gym, friskvårdsbidrag, subventionerad lunch, tjänstepension, interna seminarium, fortlöpande utbildning i din yrkesroll, tillfällen att fira våra framgångar och medarbetare samt mycket, mycket mer. Det är en del av vår kultur. En kultur som vi är mycket stolta över där du dagligen möter glädje och drivna medarbetare, och som vi hoppas att du vill bli en del av!
  
  

Några av våra medarbetare
  
Julia Maxén
  
Gruppchef
  
"Jag vill att mitt team ska få de bästa förutsättningarna för att göra sitt jobb på bästa sätt. Det är så vi utvecklar oss som team, men även utvecklar Tre framåt."
  
Henrik Sundvall
  
Digital projektledare
  
"Det absolut bästa med att vara projektledare på Tre är jag får jobba brett med kollegor från alla delar av organisationen och få lära mig nya saker varje dag. Jag har friheten att vara mig själv – och bli uppskattad för det!"
  
Jayasri Battola
  
Utvecklare
  
"The great work culture and the technology made me choose Tre. Working alongside great people in mixed team setups, with both experienced and new talents, along with the latest and greatest tools and technologies like Cloud and Azure."
  
  

Vem är du?
  
  

Vi söker dig som har svensk juristexamen och ca 8-10 års erfarenhet från advokatbyrå och/eller som bolagsjurist. Du har med andra ord en bred juridisk erfarenhet och god vana av att upprätta och förhandla olika typer av kommersiella avtal, och för denna roll krävs att du har särskild erfarenhet av att arbeta med marknadsföringsrättsliga frågor och immaterialrätt. Det är även en fördel om du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med juridiska frågor kopplade till AI-teknik, inklusive riskbedömning och regelefterlevnad, och kunskap om upphovsrättsliga aspekter av AI-genererat material.
  
  

Du är van att arbeta självständigt, prioritera, göra riskavvägningar och fatta väl avvägda beslut, och är antagligen den i din omgivning som är snabb på att svara "jajamen, det löser vi!" och har ordning och reda omkring dig. Du delar även vår syn på att vara serviceinriktad i det här yrket, vilket innebär att kunna prioritera, vara lösningsorienterad och att kunna förklara för andra på ett sätt som gör deras vardag lättare.
  
  

Tre har även licenser i Danmark och bedriver ett nära samarbete med sina systerbolag i Italien, Österrike och Storbritannien. Eftersom tjänsten innebär regelbundna internationella kontakter krävs det att du har mycket goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.
  
  

Erfarenhet av tingstjänstgöring och tvistlösning är meriterande.
  
  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Vi tar emot ansökningar via denna annons och kommer hålla intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du bifogar CV och svarar på de frågor vi ställt nedan i samband med att du söker. Vi använder tester för att säkra objektiva bedömningar i samband med urval. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Bakgrundskontroll görs på slutkandidat.
  
  

Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
  
  

Friskvårdsbidrag, föräldrarlön, pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
  
  

Flexibla helgdagar och fem dagar extra ledigt per år
  
  

Hundzon & gym i 3huset
  
  

Subventionerad lunch
  
  

Förmånliga rabatter på cyklar, kollektivtrafik och elbilar
  
  

Generösa bonusmodeller eller provisioner
  
  

Vi drivs av att hela tiden försöka göra saker bättre, på nya och annorlunda sätt. Vi ser oss själva som en avgörande del av Sveriges samhällsstruktur, eftersom vi vet att pålitlig uppkoppling är en viktig grundsten i dagens digitala värld.
  
  

Tre föddes som utmanare och är en organisation i ständig rörelse. Vi strävar efter att vara i framkant i allt vi gör. Vi är övertygade om att det är människorna och kulturen på Tre som är avgörande för vår utveckling.
  
  

När du startar din resa på Tre finns det oändliga möjligheter att växa och utvecklas med oss.
  
  

WE THINK LIKE CHALLENGERS - I en föränderlig värld, är vi på Tre nyfikna och ständigt öppna för nya lösningar. På Tre anpassar vi vägen framåt allt eftersom vi provar och lär oss vad som funkar bäst.
  
  

WE WORK LIKE CHAMPIONS - På Tre gör vi alltid vårt bästa. Vi känner ägandeskap för vår uppgift, sätter tydliga mål och håller fokus på det som gör mest nytta för affären.
  
  

WE ACT LIKE BUDDIES - På Tre är vi schyssta kollegor. Vi samarbetar med varandra över team och funktioner, vi bollar idéer, ger och tar emot feedback.
  
  

Enable "functional cookies" to watch the video
  
  

2003
  
Tre först i Sverige med videosamtal och strömning av mobil video. Att se personen som du ringer upp i ögonen är en helt ny upplevelse vid den här tidpunkten.
  
  

2006
  
Tre lanserar mobilt bredband som tredje operatör i världen. Under de kommande fem åren vinner Tre pris för Sveriges snabbaste mobila bredband.
  
  

2013
  
Tre’s systerbolag Hallon startas med en vision att vara den enkla mobiloperatören utan onödigt krångel.
  
  

2019
  
Ett händelserikt år! 3Världen lanseras som innebär att kunder kan surfa i 80 länder till samma pris som inom Sverige. Därefter lanseras 3Samla som gör att alla kunder kan lägga till fler användare till sitt abonnemang och sist men inte minst är Tre först i Sverige med ett lansera ett publikt 5G-nät.
  
  

2025
  
Tele2 Arena byter från 1 januari namn till 3Arena. Med vår starka passion för innovation, uppkoppling och upplevelser ska vi medverka till arenans och områdets utveckling.
  
  

Johanna Kjessler | Kontaktperson

title: Management Trainee - Mjukvara & Moln
description:
Vi har förmånen att leva i ett av världens finaste länder. Men vi på Atea vill mer. Som specialister inom informationsteknologi tänker vi vara med och forma ett ännu bättre Sverige. Genom att skapa lösningar som nästa generation kan känna sig stolta över är du som medarbetare på Atea med och lägger grunden till ett smartare och mer innovativt Sverige.


**Din roll i laget**
--------------------


*"**Som Management Trainee på Atea får man en unik inblick i verksamhetens olika affärsområden och enheter, i en stöttande företagskultur där personlig och professionell utveckling står i fokus. Du får möjlighet att utveckla ditt ledarskap, problemlösningsförmåga och andra färdigheter genom att leda utmanande projekt, delta i utbildningar, nätverka med kunniga kollegor, få coachning från erfarna ledare och delta i samtal på ledningsnivå. Programmet överträffade mina förväntningar genom stort ansvar och förtroende från dag ett, och ännu mer när jag insåg att mina idéer faktiskt implementerades och gjorde skillnad. Tiden som trainee var både utmanande och utvecklande, fylld av lärorika upplevelser och givande erfarenheter, men framför allt otroligt rolig och präglad av många skratt!**"*



Irma Ekdahl, fd Trainee, idag Intern Projektledare på Atea.  

  

Låter det spännande? Då kan du vara en av fyra traineer som får en unik möjlighet att under programmets gång komma in i vår verksamhet och utvecklas med oss. Under traineeperioden kommer du ha personlig kontakt med Ateas VD Linus Wallin, få en mentor med lång ledarerfarenhet och bli en del av alumninätverket för traineer.


**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
------------------------



Under traineeperiodens 10 månader kommer du att dela din tid mellan Ateas olika enheter och därefter påbörja din resa mot att bli en av våra stjärnor. Som trainee skapar du ett kontaktnät inom Atea och på så sätt marknadsför du dig och dina kunskaper.  

  

Under året roterar du på fem moduler, varav två är kopplade till din valda inriktning. Mellan modulerna har du tillsammans med de andra traineerna caseveckor, utbildningar, kontorsbesök samt mentors- och VD-dagar. När traineeperioden lider mot sitt slut beror din nästa roll på din inriktning och dina ambitioner, men även var det finns möjligheter.


**Om inriktningen**
-------------------



Det finns fyra inriktningar på årets traineeprogram; mjukvara & moln, utveckling konsultverksamhet, försäljning & upphandling Region Mitt och försäljning & upphandling Region Syd. Du väljer vilken av inriktningarna du vill söka till genom att ansöka via rätt annons. Efter genomfört traineeår fortsätter du din resa på Atea i en roll inom inriktningen.


**Mjukvara & moln – Software, Cloud & Services:**  

Software, Cloud & Services är en nationell affärsenhet inom Atea med cirka 200 medarbetare. Här arbetar team inom försäljning, cloud transformation, software asset management, service & support samt customer success – tillsammans mot en gemensam vision: att skapa det enklaste sättet att köpa, hantera och optimera mjukvara, molntjänster och serviceavtal.



Vi hjälper våra kunder genom hela livscykeln – från behovsanalys och inköp till förvaltning och optimering – och ser till att de får maximal nytta av sina investeringar. Det handlar om att kombinera teknik, affärsförståelse och kundinsikt för att skapa långsiktigt värde.



Som trainee inom denna inriktning får du möjlighet att lära dig hur Atea arbetar med mjukvara, molntjänster och serviceavtal – både strategiskt och operativt. Du får insyn i hur vi stöttar kunder i deras digitala resa och hur vi skapar lösningar som gör skillnad.



Efter traineeåret går du vidare till en roll inom Software, Cloud & Services, där du får fortsätta utvecklas inom området tillsammans med erfarna kollegor och kunder i hela landet. Läs mer här.


**Vad vi söker hos dig**
------------------------


* Du är nyutexaminerad (minst 180 hp) med max 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet efter examen. Inriktning på utbildningen har mindre betydelse.
* Du har kunskap om och intresse för it.
* Du kan identifiera dig med våra värderingar och en företagskultur som lever dessa värderingar lockar dig.
* Du söker aktivt nya utvecklingsmöjligheter och ser dig själv i en ledarroll om några år. Du är trygg och hanterar nya situationer med nyfikenhet och entusiasm. Att arbeta strukturerat och ambitiöst mot givna eller egna mål ser du som stimulerande och en given del av ditt arbete.
* Du talar och skriver flytande svenska.

**Om Atea**
-----------



Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av it-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med it och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara it-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar it-värld.



På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Detta är en CV-lös ansökningsprocess, vilket innebär att du i det första steget endast svarar på några få urvalsfrågor. Därefter kommer du att få mer information om hur den vidare processen ser ut. Har du frågor om oss eller tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Jennifer Sturedahl, jennifer.sturedahl@atea.se. **Sista ansökningsdag är den** **6 januari**.



Denna rekrytering görs tillsammans med HOME of Recruitment.



Som ett kvalitativt led i vårt rekryteringsarbete genomgår våra slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om våra framtida medarbetare.



Atea vill vara The Place To Be och därför värdesätter vi de kvalitéer som en jämn ålders- och könsfördelning samt etnisk och kulturell mångfald tillför verksamheten.

  


**Följ oss i sociala medier**

  

#LI-HYBRID


  
Stad
Stockholm
Sista ansökan

title: Account Executive Expert, Sweden
description:
**We help the world run better**  

At SAP, we keep it simple: you bring your best to us, and we'll bring out the best in you. We're builders touching over 20 industries and 80% of global commerce, and we need your unique talents to help shape what's next. The work is challenging – but it matters. You'll find a place where you can be yourself, prioritize your wellbeing, and truly belong. What's in it for you? Constant learning, skill growth, great benefits, and a team that wants you to grow and succeed. **Key Responsibilities & Tasks**  

The Account Executive's primary responsibilities include prospecting, qualifying, selling and closing new business to existing and net new customers. The Account Executive brings a Point of View to the Customer engagement; uses all resources to solve customer problems with appropriate SAP products. **Account and Customer Relationship Management, Sales and Software License and Cloud Subscription Revenue**

* Annual Revenue - Achieve / exceed quota targets.
* Sales strategies- Align SAP Cloud /SaaS solutions with the customer's strategic objectives - Develops best practice account plans to ensure revenue target delivery and sustainable growth. Develop relationships in new and existing customers and leverage to drive complex strategy through complex and global organizations.
* Trusted advisor - Establishes strong management and Cxx relationships based on knowledge of customer requirements and commitment to value (value of counsel and expertise, value of solutions, value of implementation expertise). Builds a foundation on which to harvest future business opportunities and accurate account information and coaching.
* Customer Acumen - Actively understand each customer's technology footprint, strategic growth plans, technology strategy and competitive landscape. Review public information (e.g. new executive appointments, earnings statements, press releases) for the company and its competitors to remain updated on key industry trends and issues impacting the prospect.
* Territory and Account Leadership - Lead designated territory, including, account relationships, prospect profiling, and sales cycles. Encourage all accounts to become SAP references.
* Business Planning - Develop and deliver comprehensive business plan to address customer and prospects priorities and pain points. Utilize VE, benchmarking and ROI data to support the customer's decision process.

 **Demand Generation, Pipeline and Opportunity Management**  

* Pipeline planning - Follow a disciplined approach to maintaining a rolling pipeline. Keep pipeline current and moving up the pipeline curve.
* Pipeline partnerships - Leverage support organizations including Marketing, Inside sales, Partners and channels to funnel pipeline into the assigned territory.
* Leverage SAP Solutions - Be proficient in and bring all SAP offers to bear on sales pursuits including Industry Solutions, LOB solutions (CRM, SCM, HCM, SRM et. al) and technology solutions (Business Analytics, Mobility, Database and Technology, et. al). Demonstrate early adoption of all new solutions and strategies.
* Advance and close sales opportunities - through the successful execution of the sales strategy and roadmap. Negotiate early and against a win/win strategy for SAP and its customers.
* Support all SAP promotions and events in the territory - take an active, sales leadership role in SAP events.

 **Sales Excellence**

* Build and share best practice sales and negotiation skills.
* Sell value.
* Maintain White Space analysis and execution of initiatives (up sell and cross sell) on customer base.
* Orchestrate resources: deploy appropriate teams to execute winning sales. Create OneSAP.
* Utilize best practice sales models.
* Understand SAP's competition and effectively position solutions against them.
* Maintain CRM system with accurate customer and pipeline information.

 **Leading a (Virtual) Account Team**  

* Mentor Associate /Senior Account Executives.
* Demonstrate leadership skills in the orchestration of remote teams.
* Ensure account teams and Partners are well versed in each account's strategy and well positioned for all customer touch points and events. Maximize the value of all sales support organizations.

 **Experience & Language Requirements**  

* 15+ years of experience in sales of complex business software / IT solutions Proven track record in business application software sales.
* Experience in lead role of a team selling environment.
* Demonstrated success with large transactions and lengthy sales campaigns in a fast-paced, consultative and competitive market.
* Exceptional contractual and negotiation skills.
* Business level English: Fluent
* Swedish: Fluent, Business Level
* Bachelor equivalent

 **Bring out your best**  

SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.  

  

**We win with inclusion**  

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better world.  

  

SAP is committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provides accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com.  

  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  

  

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability, in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local legal requirements.  

  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. **AI Usage in the Recruitment Process**
For information on the responsible use of AI in our recruitment process, please refer to our Guidelines for Ethical Usage of AI in the Recruiting Process.
Please note that any violation of these guidelines may result in disqualification from the hiring process.  

  

Requisition ID: 440830 | Work Area: Sales | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid

title: Lead Data Analyst – Advanced Analytics
description:
**Job Description**  

As a Lead Data Analyst focused on Advanced Analytics, you will play a key role in enabling teams across the organization to leverage data science and statistical modeling for smarter decision-making. You will drive the adoption of advanced analytical techniques, foster a culture of experimentation, and support the development of scalable, high-impact analytical solutions.


Your work will focus on empowering others through knowledge sharing, mentoring, and the creation of reusable models, frameworks, and methodologies. You will lead initiatives that improve analytical maturity, ensure consistency in the use of predictive and statistical methods, and promote continuous learning and innovation in the use of data.


The role requires a high degree of autonomy and initiative, with an emphasis on proactively identifying opportunities to apply advanced analytics to business challenges. Success in this position depends on the ability to navigate a complex, cross-functional environment, build alignment across diverse teams, and drive impactful initiatives that elevate the organization’s overall analytical capabilities. A strong understanding of business context and the ability to prioritize efforts based on strategic needs are essential to ensure that enablement activities deliver tangible value.

**WHAT YOU’LL DO:**

* Champion best practices in statistical modeling, machine learning, and experimentation across teams to ensure consistency and quality.
* Proactively identify opportunities to apply advanced analytics to improve decision-making and business outcomes.
* Lead the development of reusable analytical assets, templates, and frameworks that promote scalability and efficiency.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand their analytical needs and guide them in applying effective modeling and experimentation approaches.
* Design and deliver training sessions, workshops, and documentation to upskill colleagues in advanced analytics tools, methodologies, and interpretation.
* Monitor the adoption and performance of analytical solutions, gathering feedback and iterating to maximize impact.
* Stay current with emerging technologies and trends in data science and translate them into actionable strategies for the organization.
* Mentor colleagues and contribute to a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement.
* Lead strategic analytics initiatives that align with business goals and drive measurable value.

**WHO YOU ARE:**


We are looking for people with…

* Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* High proficiency in SQL for querying and managing data.
* Strong programming skills in Python or R, with experience in machine learning libraries and statistical packages.
* Proficiency in data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or similar.
* Solid understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing, and experimental design.
* Experience with data mining, wrangling, and feature engineering techniques.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and their data services.
* Strong business acumen and the ability to translate business requirements into analytical solutions.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Advanced presentation skills, with the ability to engage and persuade senior stakeholders with data-driven insights.
* Proven experience in mentoring and upskilling colleagues, including designing and delivering training, creating learning resources, and fostering a collaborative learning environment.
* Continuous learning mindset and ability to stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices in advanced analytics.

**Why Join Us?**


At H&M, you’ll be part of a dynamic global team working on one of the most business-critical platforms. This is an opportunity to take on end-to-end technical ownership of a complex system, collaborate across international teams, and contribute directly to how H&M continues to innovate in the fashion and retail space.


We offer a collaborative workplace, opportunities for professional growth, and the chance to make a tangible impact in one of the world’s leading retail organizations.

 **Additional Information** **WHO WE ARE**  

H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.  

  

We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future. Read more about us here

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**  

At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.  

  

All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.

**JOIN US**  

Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.

**Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.**
company_description: At H&M, we welcome you to be yourself and challenge you to grow and make a difference. Help us reimagine the future of an entire industry, making everyone look, feel & do good.

title: Systemingenjör till nästa generations flygande farkost
description:
*Vill du påverka och göra skillnad på riktigt? Här bidrar du till att skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen. Det du gör spelar roll**.*


Vill du utvecklas och samtidigt utveckla andra? Vill du, tillsammans med ett motiverat och erfaret team, vara med och definiera nästa generations flygande farkoster?  

Då ska du absolut börja hos oss på BU Advanced Programs Engineering inom Aeronautics.


Sektionen ”Avionic & Combat Cloud” behöver förstärkas med ett antal seniora medarbetare för att kunna ta steget mot nästa generationers högteknologiska flygsystem.


Din roll


Vi söker erfarna systemingenjörer för stimulerande arbetsuppgifter till vårt team i Linköping. Det här är en möjlighet för dig som vill ta dig an intressanta och utmanande uppgifter där du får samarbeta med erfarna kollegor och skapa kontakter inom stora delar av organisationen, samt i samarbeten med övrig flygindustri.


Vår sektion ansvarar för att mogna och utvärdera ny teknologi i primärt labmiljö för att förstå vilka vägval vi har mot kommande flygande farkoster/produkter. Detta är en väldigt spännande period som vi nu går in i och därför behöver sektionen växa för att kunna hänga med i den snabba utvecklingen som nu sker. Våra fokusområden är avionik, nätverk, cyber och cloud där vi har många spännande och säkerligen knepiga utmaningar framöver.


Hoppas du vill hänga med på denna resa!


Din profil


Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet av systemutveckling, är drivande och är van att påverka och ta ansvar. Du har ett stort engagemang och är en teamspelare som gärna sprider kunskap och erfarenheter. Eftersom tjänsten även kan innehålla kontakter med företag i andra länder så behärskar du engelska i både tal och skrift galant.


Erfarenhet av hård-/mjukvaruutveckling, nätverk, säkerhetskritiska system, realtidssystem och cloud är meriterande.


Rollen innebär även att du kommer få ett stort kontaktnät inom hela utvecklingsorganisationen. Din kommunikativa förmåga samt förmågan att samarbeta kommer värderas högt.


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vad blir du en del av?


Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Supply Chain team (Stockholm)
description:
**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**

Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.


We are growing in the supply chain area and are looking for a SAP Supply Chain professional and/or SAP Procurement professional who has an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in the supply chain area (e.g S2P, SD, WM, IBP, GTS) providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.


**Qualifications**
------------------

Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:


* Experience of SAP consulting / SAP SME / Stream lead / Project Manager roles in transformation projects, being the expert of one or several SAP process areas such as MM, SD, WM, IBP, GTS.
* A good understanding of end-to-end business processes, SAP best practices, and latest industry trends.
* A good understanding of the SAP product roadmap and experience of SAP S/4HANA and other SAP technologies.
* A deep understanding of various phases of project lifecycle (prepare, explore, realize, deploy) and a good understanding of S/4HANA product roadmap and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile)
* Have a team player attitude and hunger to develop new professional skills.
* Understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW

Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:


* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with 5-10 years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Also, a background with at least some experience in leading and/or coordinating your own stream.
* Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders.
* Ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner.
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as a strong advantage.
**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**We offer**

At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
  

  

Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
  

  

**How to apply**

Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
  

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* *https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/*  

  

**Questions?**

If you have any questions regarding the role or the application process, please contact Anna Taube, Manager Talent Acquisition, at ataube@deloitte.se .


**We are looking forward to your application!**

**What impact will you make?**

Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.


**Job Location**
----------------
company_description: We’re a leading professional services firm, but what makes working at Deloitte unique? When you join us, you become connected. To inspiring people. To meaningful work with fascinating clients.

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Delivery Excellence-team (Stockholm)
description:
**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**

Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.
  

  

*We are looking to grow in the following areas: SAP Delivery Excellence, Project Manager, Business Manager, PMO, Project Manager, Delivery Manager, Process Manager, Test and Release Manager*

As an experienced SAP professional, you will play a key role in driving SAP-enabled business transformation for both global enterprises and local Nordic companies. You will be involved in major SAP projects, working closely with clients to shape solutions from roadmap to post-go-live support, defining scope, planning, and ensuring successful delivery. Your responsibilities will include providing business insights, managing stakeholders, improving processes, identify needs and translating them to technical requirements and guiding leaders through digital transformation.


You will enhance your people skills by collaborating with both onshore and offshore colleagues as part of a global team. Leveraging your SAP expertise, you will lead your team in delivering adapted solutions within budget and on time. By building strong client relationships, you will create value and drive long-term business growth.


Additionally, you will have the opportunity to drive business development with new clients, applying your expertise to foster knowledge and talent growth.


**Qualifications**
------------------

To succeed in these roles, you need a strategic mindset, strong customer focus, and experience with SAP solutions and digital transformation technologies, such as SAP S/4HANA Cloud. A deep understanding of customer needs, business processes, and organizational challenges is essential. You thrive in an international environment, have broad experience, are eager to learn, and work well in teams.


**Key qualifications include:**

Experience in large-scale SAP transformation and implementation projects, while industry knowledge and subject matter expertise are valued.


**Further qualifications:**

* Completed master’s or bachelor’s degree.
* 3+ years of SAP experience across various functional areas
* 3+ years as a Project Manager
* Experience in a consulting environment and with project management methodologies such as Waterfall and Agile
* Hands-on experience with SAP modules; S/4HANA experience is a plus
* Strong leadership skills, with a track record of leading teams in projects and organizations
* Proven ability to manage client interactions, primarily in client-facing roles
* Understanding of end-to-end business processes, best practices, and industry trends
* Core consulting skills (advisory, strategy, presentation, problem-solving, coordination)
* Familiarity with project lifecycle phases (prepare, explore, realize, deploy)
* Experience as a Solution Architect, Project Manager, Functional/Process Consultant, Business Process Expert, Product Owner or similar
* Strong business expertise, problem-solving, and analytical skills
* Proficiency in English and Swedish (oral and written)
* Willingness to travel
**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**We offer**

At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
  

  

Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.

Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.

The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
  

  

**Questions?**

If you have any questions regarding the role or the application process, please contact Anna Taube, Manager Talent Acquisition, at ataube@deloitte.se .
 

**We are looking forward to your application!**

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Supply Chain team (Stockholm)
description:
**Company Description**  

Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.

 **Job Description** **Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**

Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.


We are growing in the supply chain area and are looking for a SAP Supply Chain professional and/or SAP Procurement professional who has an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in the supply chain area (e.g S2P, SD, WM, IBP, GTS) providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.

 **Qualifications**  

Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:

* Experience of SAP consulting / SAP SME / Stream lead / Project Manager roles in transformation projects, being the expert of one or several SAP process areas such as MM, SD, WM, IBP, GTS.
* A good understanding of end-to-end business processes, SAP best practices, and latest industry trends.
* A good understanding of the SAP product roadmap and experience of SAP S/4HANA and other SAP technologies.
* A deep understanding of various phases of project lifecycle (prepare, explore, realize, deploy) and a good understanding of S/4HANA product roadmap and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile)
* Have a team player attitude and hunger to develop new professional skills.
* Understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW


Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:

* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with 5-10 years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Also, a background with at least some experience in leading and/or coordinating your own stream.
* Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders.
* Ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner.
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as a strong advantage.

  

**Additional Information** **We offer**

At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.  

  

Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.  

  

**How to apply**


Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.  

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* *https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/*  

  

**Questions?**


If you have any questions regarding the role or the application process, please contact Anna Taube, Manager Talent Acquisition, at ataube@deloitte.se.

**We are looking forward to your application!**

**What impact will you make?**


Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.
company_description: We’re a leading professional services firm, but what makes working at Deloitte unique? When you join us, you become connected. To inspiring people. To meaningful work with fascinating clients.

title: Grafisk formgivare till tidsbegränsat uppdrag (god chans till förlängning)
description:
**Human Performance** är en snabbt växande mediebyrå där du får chansen att arbeta med några av Sveriges mest välkända varumärken och annonslösningar – i några av landets mest lästa tidningar, så som Svenska Dagbladet och Aftonbladet.  

Vi skapar kreativ och resultatinriktad kommunikation, både i print och digitalt, och är ständigt i rörelse för att utveckla nya affärsområden. Hos oss blir du en del av ett engagerat och drivet team som tror på samarbete, kvalitet och idéer som sticker ut.  

  

**Om uppdraget**  

Vi erbjuder ett tidsbegränsat uppdrag på **heltid under 6 månader med god chans till förlängning**, där du får arbeta med varierande och utvecklande uppgifter inom grafisk formgivning. Du blir en viktig del av ett team som arbetar nära redaktion, sälj och produktion – och du får stor möjlighet att sätta din egen prägel på slutprodukten.  

  

**I rollen kommer du att**

  

* Producera och utveckla våra magasin, både i print och digitalt.
* Skapa annonser och grafiskt material för digital marknadsföring (skärmar, banners m.m.).
* Arbeta med layout, formgivning, digital publicering och leverans till tryck.
* Samarbeta med redaktionen för att skapa en enhetlig och attraktiv grafisk helhet.
* Delta i produktion av marknadsföringsmaterial för både interna och externa uppdrag.


Uppdraget kräver god förmåga att hantera flera projekt parallellt och att leverera snabbt och säkert i en miljö med högt tempo.  

  

**Vi söker dig som**

  

* Har examen inom grafisk formgivning eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Har 1-3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom tidskriftslayout och digitala annonser.
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud, särskilt InDesign och Photoshop.
* Är van vid korta deadlines och trivs i ett kreativt, snabbt tempo.
* Är flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Är ansvarstagande, noggrann och har lätt för att samarbeta.
* Har ett starkt designintresse och en prestigelös, lösningsorienterad attityd.


Meriterande: Kunskaper i HTML/HTML5 och WordPress.  

  

**Omfattning och start**  

Omfattning: Heltid  

Typ av anställning: Tidsbegränsat uppdrag, 6 månader, med chans till förlängning.  

Start: Omgående

title: iOS Tech Lead - Stockholm
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

We are looking for an experienced iOS Developer with strong technical leadership experience to join a small, high-impact team. This hands-on role focuses on modernizing legacy code, driving scalable architectures, and setting the foundation for apps used by millions of users.You will play a key role in shaping technical direction, improving app performance, and ensuring reliability while collaborating across engineering, design, QA, and product teams.


**Key Responsibilities:**

* Lead the evolution of the iOS app, defining technical strategy, architecture, and coding standards for scalability and performance.
* Collaborate with engineers, designers, QA, and product owners to deliver exceptional user experiences.
* Refactor and modernize legacy components, moving toward a modular, testable, Swift-first codebase (SwiftUI, async/await, Combine).
* Drive architecture discussions and define patterns (MVVM, Clean Architecture, modularization) to support long-term growth.
* Own CI/CD and infrastructure improvements, optimizing build times, testing, and release automation.
* Mentor engineers, conduct code reviews, and promote a culture of technical excellence.
* Ensure performance, quality, and security through tools like Instruments, MetricKit, and automated testing frameworks.
* Take ownership of key initiatives end-to-end, from design to release, ensuring maintainable and robust solutions.
* 

**Requirements:**

* 10+ years of iOS development experience with deep expertise in Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and modern concurrency.
* Proven experience leading technical direction or architectural initiatives for large-scale apps.
* Strong knowledge of software design principles, dependency injection, and modular architecture.
* Skilled in refactoring and modernizing complex codebases.
* Passionate about code quality, testing, and automation (unit, UI, and snapshot tests).
* Hands-on experience with CI/CD systems (Fastlane, Xcode Cloud, Codemagic, or GitHub Actions).
* Excellent communicator and mentor, capable of building technical alignment across teams.
* Proactive, forward-thinking, and focused on improving app performance, reliability, and developer experience.
* Experience with Firebase, MapKit, StoreKit, or large-scale mobile data architecture is a plus.
* 

**What We Offer:**

  

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Full- Stack Engineer
description:
Join the mission to transform healthcare with Yazen health


Do you want to build technology that truly changes lives? At Yazen health, we’re not just another health tech company — we’re redefining how obesity is treated, combining medical expertise, behavioral science, and smart technology to help people achieve lasting, healthy change.


We’re expanding fast across Europe and are looking for a Full-Stack Engineer who’s ready to create impact, shape the future of digital healthcare, and grow with us.


Yazen was recently ranked #2 fastest-growing company in Europe by Sifted’s 2025 Startup Europe Leaderboard — and the #1 in the Nordics and Benelux with a revenue growth of nearly 80x in just two years  

  

About Yazen Health  

We believe healthcare should be personal, compassionate, and data-driven.  

  

At Yazen, you’ll join a small, passionate team where ideas matter and ownership is real. Our work spans everything from patient-facing apps and journal systems to clinical tools and content creation — all with one goal: to make high-quality care accessible and effective.  

If you’re driven by purpose, love solving tough problems, and want to see your code make a difference in people’s lives, you’ll fit right in.  

  

Your Role  

As a Full-Stack Engineer, you’ll be at the heart of our product development — turning ideas into experiences that inspire and empower our users. You will:

  

* Collaborate with designers, developers, and product minds to craft seamless, full-stack solutions that make healthcare smarter.
* Build and refine both front-end and back-end features for performance, reliability, and beauty.
* Write clean, maintainable, and testable code — and continuously raise the bar for quality.
* Explore, evaluate, and implement new technologies that make us faster, smarter, and more effective.
* Troubleshoot issues and deliver solutions with empathy — because every bug fixed means a better experience for a patient.

  

Our Tech Stack  

**Front-end:** React, React Native, Expo  

**Back-end:** Firebase, Node.js  

**Tools & Infrastructure:** GitHub, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)  

  

What We Value

  

* A passion for using technology to improve people’s health.
* Curiosity and adaptability in a fast-moving environment.
* A proactive, hands-on attitude — you make things happen.
* Great communication skills, especially in remote teams.
* A collaborative spirit and appreciation for feedback.
* Comfort with using data to guide and measure your work.

  

What We’re Looking For

  

* Experience with React and Node.js (React Native and Firebase are bonuses).
* Solid understanding of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and CSS.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a creative mindset.
* Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
* Ability to self-manage, prioritize, and deliver on time.
* Based in Sweden is a plus (valid work permit required).

  

What Makes You Stand Out

  

* You take initiative — you don’t wait to be told what to do.
* You’re obsessed with quality and user experience.
* You love learning, sharing, and collaborating.
* You want your work to *mean* something — to have real human impact.

  

What We Offer

  

* A mission-driven environment where your work directly helps people live healthier lives.
* Flexible remote work with a team that values trust and transparency.
* A culture of continuous learning and personal growth.
* The chance to be part of a fast-growing, innovative healthcare scale-up shaping the future of obesity treatment.

title: Senior Cloud Security Engineer (TC)
description:
**Assignment description**


For our client, we are looking for a Senior Cloud Security Engineer to support the deployment of a secure, automated confidential computing solution.

  

The consultant will finalize the deployment of a TC Confidential Computing solution enabling secure third-party access to a Data Lake. The work includes automation as code delivery, integration of attestation services and Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), certificate management, and collaboration with automation and networking teams. The consultant will also ensure proper integration with data transfer nodes, PBS services for GPU and OCP workloads, verify GPU MPS and AMD SEV functionality, and update LLDs based on the as-built environment.

 **Requirements:**

* Proven experience in confidential or trusted computing environments (TC Confidential Computing)
* Strong skills in automation and infrastructure as code
* Knowledge of attestation, TEE, and certificate management
* Experience with GPU environments, preferably AMD SEV
* Familiarity with PBS, OCP, and data integration

**Start date:** ASAP

**Duration:** 1–3 months, possible extension.

**Location:** Sweden. Most of the work can be done remotely.

**Required skills** Cloud Security , Certificate Management , Infrastructure as Code (IaC) , Automation ,Trusted Computing ,AMD SEV ,Trusted Execution Environments (TEE) , GPU Environments, PBS , OCP

**Languages** English(Proficient)

title: People Partner
description:
### **IGNITE THE GROWTH OF B2B SUBSCRIPTION LEADERS**


Subscription-based models are transforming B2B businesses—unlocking scalable growth, predictable revenue, and deeper client engagement. Yet as these businesses evolve, many struggle to scale efficiently. That’s where Younium comes in. We built a powerful cloud platform tailored to the advanced needs of B2B subscriptions, enabling businesses to handle complex subscriptions, streamline financial operations, and enhance their reporting capabilities.

#### **We are Younium!**


Gone are the startup days: We are now in full growth mode. You’ll thrive in a high-energy, creative, and transparent environment fueled by collaboration. With hubs in Amsterdam, Kraków, Stockholm, Malmö, and Philadelphia, plus remote contributors, we’re building a truly global team.


Curious to help businesses master their subscription economies? Come join us.

#### **What you will do:**

* Source candidates, organize, and lead the full recruitment processes.
* Ensure we maintain a high standard of candidate experience.
* Improve our internal P&C processes, tools & way of working.
* Supporting the organization in HR matters. You'll support both employees and managers daily.
* Lead and execute on P&C initiatives.

#### **Who are you?**


You thrive when you roll up your sleeves and deliver. With an entrepreneurial spirit and a business-savvy mindset, you see opportunities rather than obstacles.


Our current Head of People & Culture will begin parental leave, and you’ll take on the HR responsibilities in her absence. In this HR role, you’ll own everything from hiring top talent to shaping and delivering on the company's people strategy and culture.


You believe Employer Branding and candidate experience matter - you know how they drive outcomes like attraction and retention. Every day will bring something different. You’ll get to build, influence, and implement the people agenda with freedom and purpose - and you’ll enjoy it.


You hold yourself accountable. You take ownership of your work, meet commitments, and stay curious.


You engage with people and you communicate clearly - with candidates, colleagues, and leaders. Your ability to connect, listen, and express ideas matters at every level.

**Must have:**

  

* 3-5 years of experience managing the *full recruitment cycle* in a fast-paced environment, preferably in an IT/SaaS company. Recruiting for one or several of these roles is a must: B2B/Tech Sales and Marketing, Developers, Customer Relations/Customer Success, and Specialist roles within product management.
* Degree in Business Administration, HRM, or another relevant field.
* Previous experience in supporting managers in an HR Business Partner role (or similar).
* A good understanding of HR metrics and analytics (Retention, time to hire, eNPS, cNPS, etc.)
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English (bonus if you speak Dutch or German).
* 

**Nice to have:**

  

* Experience in a role where Performance Management was part of your responsibilities (for example, feedback, performance reviews, L&D, etc).
* A good understanding of finance, payroll, and legal.
* Skills in various sourcing methodologies (i.e, LinkedIn Recruiter)
* Experiences in social selling, i.e, for Recruitment and Employer Branding purposes.
* Experience in tools like Teamtailor, HaileyHR, and Alva Labs.

##### **The Younium team spirit**

* 70+ passionate team members across Stockholm, Malmö, Kraków, Amsterdam, Philadelphia, and remote
* A tight-knit culture blending agility, transparency, and substantial ownership and accountability, balanced by collaboration across the board
* Growth mindset: continuous learning and development, internal mobility, and inclusion at our core. We embrace an attitude of constant willingness to improve, not comfort.
* You’ll be part of a performance-first team where self‑starters thrive
* True work-life harmony: remote-friendly setup, flexible hours, and boundaries you can trust
* Above all, we believe in having fun together, both on and off the clock!

*The preferred starting date for this position is ASAP.*

*Please note that we do not offer any relocation package, nor will we recruit outside the EU for this position. This role will be based in Stockholm with a hybrid remote setup.*
